summary:: First time I am thinking up newsletter ideas

So this is basically going to be newsletter + blog article. 

# Newsletter
[[My Newsletter - Automated Weekly Review in Obsidian]]


# Blog Article
- [[My BlogPost - Automated Weekly Review in Obsidian]]
- YT-Weekly Review
	- Designing the weekly review + my experience 
	- The most basic weekly review 
		- template in obsidian (periodic notes, log, )
		- logic behind it (just one log:: )

data.content:
mode:: #mode/lifeüè† 
kind:: #Periodic/DailyüìÖ 
<< [[2022-03-21]] | [[Weekly Review 2022-W13 (Mar-21)]]  | [[2022-03-23]] >>

# Daily Checklist
- #### Check and Update
	- [ ] Check calendar for plans
	- [ ] Updates - add to task or calendar
		- [ ] Email
		- [ ] Telegram
		- [ ] Slack
	- [ ] Set alarm for all major events

- #### Habits - Do and Track
	- [-] straight out of bed to desk
	- [x] tea
	- [ ] Exercise - yoga or walk or swim or strength training
	- [ ] Work 4 hours at least
		- [ ] forest
	- [ ] Youtube - script writing, research, filming, editting, thumbnails, vlog?

#### Tracking
- feeling:: distracted then stressed
- energy:: 7

- youtuber_log:: did extensive video edits (canva! I made an intro, cute graphics - use the weekly review one!! I haven't but it is so cute) + pass through
- work_log:: rewriting and survey paper meeting
- life_log:: table tennis :) and aunties (julie, ros, ros teo and mary came over along with derrik daughter :D I had to leave in a rush for table tennis tho) - oh and no co-work coz sammy got covid (so I was pretty unproductive)
- memories::
- daily_log::

- consumption_log:: [The 2021 Battle of the Top 7 Webcams - Brio, Razer Kiyo, Streamcam, C930, AVerMedia 513 + More - YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FQD-xbcZbDs) So actually I think Brio or Streamcam both look really nice, hmm marcus webcam is already coming tho, do I need to upgrade
- fiction_reading_log::
- weight:: 93.45
# Tasks
- [ ] Survey paper rewrite [[Survey paper Meeting 2022-03-22]]
- [ ] Graphics for [[YT Video - automated weekly review in obsidian]]
	- [ ] explain how weekly review works (cut out from the page) & calendar
	- [ ] try to edit out buggy code
	- [ ] add in b-roll for the last part (weekly review - daily page) + arrows
	- [ ] speech - if this was useful please like and subscribe :) I have free templates under a link in the description box, do remember to change the folder paths and periodic tags (or use mine). 
	- [x] thumbnails - dowloads folder
- [ ] connect revue (newsletter) to a blog (get a domain...)
	- which blog platform [Elizabeth Filips](https://www.elizabethfilips.com/) 
		- Ness Labs [WordPress Hosting - Full Featured, Fast, Secure, Recommended](https://www.dreamhost.com/wordpress/)

# Log
- 12:27 PM aww looks like sammy cannot co-work because she got covid, sad was looking forward to this. Gonna do a bit of youtube till 1PM
- 12:42 PM I honestly want to do some video editting - list of graphics I need?
- 1:48 PM finished with thumbnails on canva - honestly don't really like any of them tho. eating lunch.
- 2:30 PM ok finally stopped procrastinating OMG 2 hours
- 2:30 PM Start rewrite!
- 3:24 PM I wrote a bit of the newsletter for revue then clicked and it was lost OMG [[YT Video - automated weekly review in obsidian]] ‚Üí  [[My Newsletter - Automated Weekly Review in Obsidian]]
- 3:41 PM PTYA saw Ness labs bonus content - actually so good
- 3:53 PM continue rewriting
- 4:33 PM break - I went to say hi to jiali mama :) and she saw my workout video on youtube lols
- What do you need in a newsletter 
	- deep and personal connection to you
	- what content have you been consuming?
	- book recs
	- doesn't have to be new - repurpose from your other content
	- much more invested audience
	- random stuff - curate as a service (found a cute youtube channel - like the history one or slow vlogs) - kinda like a hybrid obsidian newsletter vs youtuber newsletter
		- talk about something you like
- start with
	- twitter
	- shorts
	- newsletter
- Convertikit? ali says great
- saw the aunties at club
- [[tracker-Youtube Progress Check-In]] Current youtube progress 2022-03-22
	- 2 videos and 1 short
	- 82/4000 Watch Hours = 0.0205%
	- 146/1000 Subscribles = 0.146%
- 7:53 PM Argh forgot my sgcc card again. 
	- [ ] Have a wallet that I move from swimming & table tennis
- 7:54 PM 4.50 per pax for guest to club
- memories:: feels like I am a more considerate person now - I shared my cold water cooler water bottle with papa :) [[achievement]]
	- also I have pics!
- [ ] Do photo-memories rollup where I see pictures of like memories...
- back from table tennis [[thinking-about-my-feelings]] actually after the huge spike in workload (make a graphic, rewrite + review paper) I have been feeling kinda stressed >..< and just anxious but I am going to work on my youtube :) hehe just thinking about it makes me happy.
- [ ] Checklist for driving (side mirror, seatbelt, headlights, everything door closed and boot, check for cars and passengers!)
- 3:07 AM Do how I actually use obsidian in my daily life. Day in the life of an obsidian user.  [[vid-day in the life with obsidian]] Kinda vlog but also just like more obsidian focused. Daily checklist. Time stamp. Template. Read papers send to Mac and put in obsidian. Ehh can excalidraw but I prefer writing. Calendar then walk podcast. Braintoss and Apple mail import. Then dinner. YouTube video edits. Process zettel. Downtime. Fiction quote Braintoss. Sleep

- 9:21 PM Video about checklist and for cars [[vid-checklists are the best way to not forget]]

- 10:05 PM doing a bit of quick read of paper to review - new setting (minimalism), never really looked at robots that are connected to the object... looks pretty good. so far [[Work Log - Review Paper Swasti - 2022-03-22]]
- [[Work Plan - Survey paper and Review - 2022-03-22]]
- ok now I have a plan :) feels better
- [ ] Template fix the date at the end
- [ ] Tinkerbot task management thing [Discord](https://discord.com/channels/686053708261228577/710585052769157141/955763049418088500)
- [x] Fixed weekly review template - renaming thing
	- note for [[YT Video - automated weekly review in obsidian]] - if you want it to work with just open new weekly from daily page instead of using the templater plugin then you kinda have to do renaming and meta-templater
- [[vid-how to modify templater templates]] kinda like how to use javascript to do cool things? I think this may exist but check. also kinda like how to understand documentation
- 10:35 PM work on newsletter articles [[Newsletter Articles - Processing Pg]] and [[YT Plan - Newsletter Content - 2022-03-22]]
- `sed -i .backup 's/+ title + tp.date.now("YYYY-MM-DD")/+ title + " " + tp.date.now("YYYY-MM-DD") ; /g' *.md` [[Obsidian Tips]] just used this to add a space for date to my template renaming scheme
- [ ] Mama physio therapy vid?
- been video editting with a short break to accompany mama for physio therapy
- 1:57 AM omg I just had the worst scare where like a huge part of my timeline was missing (coz I deleted and didn't realize. Thank god it was a recent delete in the undo history)  
- 2:14 AM stopped halfway through the video edit - have done a lot today
						- 3:07 AM Do how I actually use obsidian in my daily life. Day in the life of an obsidian user. 

Kinda vlog but also just like more obsidian focused. Daily checklist. Time stamp. Template. Read papers send to Mac and put in obsidian. Ehh can excalidraw but I prefer writing. Calendar then walk podcast. Braintoss and Apple mail import. Then dinner. YouTube video edits. Process zettel. Downtime. Fiction quote Braintoss. Sleep

- 11:41 AM Weekly review for beginners. Most basic minimal outline [[vid-minimal weekly review in obsidian]]

- 4:00 AM Monthly fav series  [[yt-series-monthly favourites]] kinda like a curation service, also close to viewers. also can do yearly summary

- 4:17 AM Da Vinci save my fav title n texts 
	- [ ] Come up with a set of standard graphics and just save them! [[Things to do for youtube]] - can I make it come with the sound effect?

 # What's in a Weekly Review

Based off GTD

Structure of my weekly review

# Video
I have a video on this

do a block for each type of code block

# Daily Checklist
- #### Check and Update
	- [x] Check calendar for plans
	- [ ] Updates - add to task or calendar
		- [ ] Email
		- [ ] Telegram
		- [ ] Slack

	- [ ] tea
	- [ ] Exercise - yoga or walk or swim or strength training

		- [ ] forest
	- [ ] Youtube - script writing, research, filming, editting, thumbnails, vlog?

#### Tracking
- feeling::

- youtuber_log:: 
- work_log:: 
- life_log::
- memories::

- fiction_reading_log::
# Tasks
- [ ] Book going to table tennis with kym [[2022-04-02]] - aim for 10AM
	- [ ] check guest to club regulations

![[Work Plan - Survey paper and Review - 2022-03-22#2022-03-23]]

# Log
- I want to see a new tab / wallpaper that is just plain white (beige) with like handwriting font something (can be my name or a quote) - feel like I want the simplistic minimalist vibe
- 12:34 PM starting work >...< I had a really bad stomachache this morning. I slept quite a bit after that.
	- was kinda stressed coz could hear mama and the maid quarrelling
- consumption_log:: I saw how linus tech tips makes their 17 videos a week (rec from PTYA) and hmm that is inspiring me to use some kinda notion board - just that they all have access, I also want a filming checklist and like a process (writers ‚Üí  prep ppl for video ‚Üí  video filming ‚Üí  editor)
- 12:42 PM chatting with sammy a bit! hehe fun
- 12:49 PM going to run graphics harvest and cleanup now, can watch PTYA at the same time?
	- ok the computer suddenly quit... so maybe good thing I am going to NUS tmr? Might just be an update so check on it later
- 11:44 AM [[z-doing less makes us feel worse]] maybe burnout isn't having too much but doing too much you don't like... like you don't get burnout from watching a movie marathon. It is about energy management but actually I get energy from doing things I like (youtube content ideation)
	- Reducing your workload is counterproductive for making u feel better actually. 
	What u need is more on your calendar that u look forward to. 
	So alignment and also for procrastinators coz when u reduce stuff u don't feel more relaxed. 
- 12:59 PM ok so team viewer is a fail, gonna do it tmr - changing [[Work Plan - Survey paper and Review - 2022-03-22]] now
- [[vid-status tags and how to use them for a quick bookmark system]] have bookmarks at the side and then use that...
- start [[Work Log - Review Paper Swasti - 2022-03-22]]
- [[vid-nanowrimo in obsidian]] could be a series but basically similar to [How I Plan and Write Fiction in Obsidian ‚Äì Vanessa Glau](https://write.as/vanessaglau/how-i-plan-and-write-fiction-in-obsidian) but like world building in obsidian + a very nice base vault for just that?
- I was super produtive in reviewing paper. 1:47 PM lunch is here now so going to eat and relax a bit
- if covid was a trail run for the apocalypse then we know people really do hoard toilet paper like crazy - see history of the internet [[random thoughts]]
- what is the name of that fanfic where harry is like an inventor, a kid that survived the apocalypse years - the lost generation? riddle is trying to become a leader of one of the groups... he got a letter delivered to the mailbox and harry was like... what is a letter box lols
- fiction_reading_log:: some technoblade in apoclaypse that started out cool with kingdom building then tommy appeared in kid form and it just got really dull
- [[z-actually the righteous path can be really fake and dark side is authentic trope]]
	- WCSP Ch35 - Liuhe - Chrysanthemum Garden
	- source:: [WCSP Ch35 - Liuhe - Chrysanthemum Garden](https://chrysanthemumgarden.com/novel-tl/wcsp/wcsp-35/)
	- According to the Righteous Path, cultivation required restraint. The five colours blinded the eyes, the five tones deafened the ears and the five flavours dulled the mouth. One should cleanse one‚Äôs heart and limit one‚Äôs desires, and not indulge in mere worldly possessions. oxvzk7
	- The Demonic Path, on the other hand, was different. It centred on following one‚Äôs inclinations. To supress the five desires, which were part of human nature, could only bring madness. To speak countless words was worthless. It was not as good as keeping the balance within. One should hold true to one‚Äôs own will, this was the way to success.
- [[vid-novel recs for subtly romantic webnovels and fanfics]] so there is that one where kakashi and some kunoichi who helped him teach then later turned out that her family sealed her coz her little sister had mokuton
- 2:59 PM I have finished lunch - ehh it was a bit over time but so satisfying - recooked the half boiled eggs in the airfryer and that was actually really good - truffle halfboiled eggs are great!
- 3:01 PM haha feeling a little lazy and don't want to start work immediately, lets do a bit of youtube [[YT Plan - Newsletter Content - 2022-03-22]]
